snippet: Andy Murray closed in on the No. 1 ranking by winning his third straight ATP title at the Erste Bank Open on Sunday....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray closed in on the No. 1 ranking by winning his third straight ATP title at the Erste Bank Open on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Murray Beats Tsonga in Vienna for 3rd Straight ATP Title
headline.main: Murray Beats Tsonga in Vienna for 3rd Straight ATP Title
